title: No Mastery 7 Token
body: I finished a One For All game as Yasuo and I got an S but no Mastery 7 Token. I am Mastery 6 with Yasuo.

replies.body: Congratulations on getting an S!  Currently, tokens are only available in a matchamde summoner's rift game.  More details are also available in our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  Hope that helps clear things up, and good luck!
Unfortunately, you cannot earn mastery tokens on One For All. You can only earn them on normal and ranked Summoner's Rift.
